name: Spider Solitaire-Classical
description:
Classic Spider Solitaire now brought to iPhone/iPad.

Are you lucky today? Just test it right now!

-------------------------------------
- Too hard to play? Try the Easy difficulty and use the Hint button any time.
- Right handed? No problem, let's active the 'right handed' option.
- See how your friend played? Invite your friend via Game Center and compare via Game Center Leaderboard.
--------------------------------------------

Just tap or drag as you want to play!

Any suggestions sent to ios20130508@sina.com .
